name: Project Drift Crystal
description:
Project Drift Crystal is a in-development kart-racer game project. It is based on a previous kart racing game I made which I felt could've been much better than it came out to be in the end, so I'm treating it as the prototype for this new project! I'm making this project public and free for people to play as I'm aiming to grow a community for it and get feedback, however when the game is officially finished and released it will have a price.

Feel free to try it out and give your opinions on what's currently in the game! Note that Project Drift Crystal is of course a temporary name for the game until I decide on a final one in later development.

CONTROLS

Keyboard:

Driving/Steering - Arrow Keys

Drift - Space

Look Behind - A

Gamepad:

Driving/Steering - Left Joystick

Drift - Right Bumper

Look Behind - Left Bumper
